description: [Business Wire] - LONDON--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- Technavio has announced the top six leading vendors in their recent Global Cobalt Market Outlook 2015-2019. The global cobalt market is expected to witness significant growth during the forecast period primarily due to the increased use of cobalt in the manufacturing of batteries and superalloys. The global cobalt market is highly fragmented with small and large vendors operating in a highly competitive market.
title: Technavio Announces Top Six Vendors in the Global Cobalt Market Outlook
